page.title: 09Boarding_Wing Life
page.content: During the week I stay in our school boarding wing and here is a typical day in my life. 0700 hours;the bell rings and it's time to get up and washed. 0740 hours; breakfast time. 0800 hours; look at rota to see if I'm supposed to be washing dishes. 0830 hours; walk over to school which begins at 0855 hours. 1530 hours; school finishes, back to boarding wing to get changed. 1600 hours; homework in the mobile classroom. 1630 hours; watch television. 1700 hours; time for tea. 1720 hours; outside to play if the weather is suitable. 1900 hours; supper. 2030 hours; bedtime. 2045 hours; lights out.
